entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
